referenceObject.reference: Ruiz, G. R. S. & Maddison, W. P. (2012). DNA sequences corroborate Soesiladeepakius as a non-salticoid genus of jumping spiders: placement with lapsiines, phylogeny, and description of six new species (Araneae, Salticidae). Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 165(2): 274-295.
